mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.name, e.fk_dept_id, e.fk_grade_no, e.fk_branch_no, e.mail, e.tel, to_char(hire_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS hire_date , e.profile_img, d.dept_name, d.manager_id , g.grade_name, b.branch_name FROM tbl_employee e JOIN tbl_department d ON e.fk_dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN tbl_grade g ON e.fk_grade_no = g.grade_no JOIN tbl_branch b ON e.fk_branch_no = b.branch_no ORDER BY e.fk_branch_no, d.dept_id, g.grade_no
SELECT dept_name FROM tbl_department ORDER BY dept_id
SELECT branch_name FROM tbl_branch ORDER BY branch_no
